price: ‘আৰু নিশ্চয় মই সিহঁতৰ ওচৰলৈ উপঢৌকন প্ৰেৰণ কৰিম, চাওঁ, কটকীয়ে কি সংবাদ লৈ উভতি আহে’।
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
